subject: Baseball
Memorabilia
lead_paragraph: Andy Fogel an estimated 3,000 pieces of Mets memorabilia, including Jerry Grote’s catching equipment from the 1960’s and a jersey worn by Casey Stengel.
snippet: Andy Fogel an estimated 3,000 pieces of Mets memorabilia, including Jerry Grote’s catching equipment from the 1960’s and a jersey worn by Casey Stengel.
